title: What Does It Take to Escape Bronze Hell?
body:
Just curious what I could do that I'm not currently doing to escape from Bronze.

I was Silver V last season and would like to finish at least at that level at the end of this season. Personally, I always try to be the best teammate I can be. I try to learn something new each game and try to constantly improve my play. I always ping MIA when my lane leaves, I camp tower when I am losing lane to avoid feeding, I try to position myself well so I don't get ganked or killed based on bad positioning, etc. However, I cannot control the actions of my teammates.

**For those who have climbed out of bronze, what are some specific tips you can give me? **

Also, please don't flame or troll on this thread. I'm looking for genuine advice.
